description: CephObjectStoreUser represents a Ceph Object Store Gateway User

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: ObjectStoreUserSpec represent the spec of an Objectstoreuser

capabilities.description: Additional admin-level capabilities for the Ceph object store user

amz-cache.description: Add capabilities for user to send request to RGW Cache API header. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/rgw-cache/#cache-api

bilog.description: Add capabilities for user to change bucket index logging. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

bucket.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store buckets. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

buckets.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store buckets. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

datalog.description: Add capabilities for user to change data logging. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

info.description: Admin capabilities to read/write information about the user. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

mdlog.description: Add capabilities for user to change metadata logging. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

metadata.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store metadata. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

oidc-provider.description: Add capabilities for user to change oidc provider. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

ratelimit.description: Add capabilities for user to set rate limiter for user and bucket. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

roles.description: Admin capabilities to read/write roles for user. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

usage.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store usage. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

user.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store users. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

user-policy.description: Add capabilities for user to change user policies. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

users.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store users. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

zone.description: Admin capabilities to read/write Ceph object store zones. Documented in https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#add-remove-admin-capabilities

clusterNamespace.description: The namespace where the parent CephCluster and CephObjectStore are found

displayName.description: The display name for the ceph users

quotas.description: ObjectUserQuotaSpec can be used to set quotas for the object store user to limit their usage. See the [Ceph docs](https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/admin/?#quota-management) for more

maxBuckets.description: Maximum bucket limit for the ceph user

maxObjects.description: Maximum number of objects across all the user's buckets

maxSize.description:
Maximum size limit of all objects across all the user's buckets
See https://pkg.go.dev/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/api/resource#Quantity for more info.

store.description: The store the user will be created in

status.description: ObjectStoreUserStatus represents the status Ceph Object Store Gateway User

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the latest generation observed by the controller.
